page.title: 14FINZEAN HEALTH AND WELFARE.
page.content: Residents rely on the services of {Aboyne or Banchory doctors,}the Health Centre at Aboyne having 3 and Banchory 8.{Nurses,health visitors,chiropodists {and physiotherapists}work from each Centre and an{optician}from Aboyne which which adjoins a{small geriatric {hospital which also deals with minor {injuries.} Banchory has a{convalescent {hospital,}Glen o'Dee. {Major injuries,illnesses or surgical {cases go to Aberdeen and babies are {born at Torphins}if birth is normal. A new{dental surgery}at Aboyne has 2 dentists,a dental hygienist and a visiting orthodontical surgeon while Banchory has a dental practice and orthodontic clinic. There is a{meals on wheels service}for the elderly, operated by the WRVS. There is no longer a resident nurse.
